product_name: FARMACYMini Green Clean Whipped Foaming Cleanser
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackThe Green Clean Whipped Foaming Cleanser from Farmacy draws out dirt, oil, and impurities caused by pollution with green clay, papaya enzyme, and moringa.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis pH-balanced and oil-free formula gently cleanses pores without stripping skin of essential moistureAlso contains sodium PCA, which replenishes skin hydration, promoting a supple, healthy-looking complexionKey IngredientsMoringa: nourishes skin by removing visible impurities caused by pollutionPapaya: helps cleanse skin and lift away impuritiesGreen Clay: Helps absorb oil and remove buildup without stripping skin barrierResearch ResultsBased on consumer panel on 31 subjects immediately after use, 100% agreed:Cleanser reduced the look of poresCleanser drew out dirt, oil + impuritiesFoaming texture was non-drying to skinItem 2641310How To Use-Start with your favorite Farmacy Cleansing Balm (sold separately) to remove makeup.-Then apply Whipped Foaming Cleanser daily AM/PM to wet skin.-Rinse and pat dry.-Avoid direct contact with eyes.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Isethionate, Sodium Cocoyl Glycinate, Decyl Glucoside, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Sodium Lauroyl Methyl Isethionate, Coconut Acid, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Myristic Acid, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Moringa Oleifera Leaf Water, Sodium Pca, Kaolin, Lactobacillus/Papaya Fruit Ferment Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Montmorillonite, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Quillaja Saponaria Wood Extract, Lauric Acid, Cocamide Mipa, Sodium Isethionate, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Sodium Benzoate, Palmitic Acid, Lactic Acid, Illite, 3-Hexenol, Beta-Caryophyllene, Canarium Luzonicum Gum Nonvolatiles, Citronellal, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Fruit Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit Extract, Eugenol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hexenyl Acetate, Linalool, Linalyl Acetate, Triethyl Citrate, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Extract, Capric Acid, Quartz, Saponaria Officinalis Leaf/Root Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Gluconolactone, Maltodextrin, Yellow 5 (Ci 19140), Blue 1 (Ci 42090), Limonene.The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
